Html: Does anyone has any idea , How to do motion detection in Goblin XNA application? We have one Implementation of Motion Detection done by AForge Team but there framework is totally different from Goblin . So facing lots of problem in implementing it..
never tried it.. but a library for motion detection called Touchless sdk seems promising...

v3.5 contains functionalities that let you set the callback function for DirectShowCapture whenever a new image is grabbed. You can use that to perform any image analysis.

Ohan
